title: What is true when actual inf higher than exp inf

content.question: In the short run, if the actual rate of inflation is higher than expected, which of the following is true?

choices.label: The short-run Phillips curve will shift to the left.
The unemployment rate will be higher than the inflation rate.
The unemployment rate will be lower than the inflation rate.
The actual unemployment rate will be higher than the natural rate.
The actual unemployment rate will be lower than the natural rate.

content.answer: The actual unemployment rate will be lower than the natural rate.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
